1.content: Analyze and organize the entire KCT ecosystem
1.details:
Identify all applications in the workspace:
- kct-admin-hub (Main admin dashboard)
- max-out-admin (Inventory management - already in Git)
- kct-inventory-manager (Inventory component)
- kct-inventory-dashboard (Inventory dashboard)
- kct-admin-dashboard (Admin dashboard)
- wedding-portal (Wedding management)
- groomsmen-portal (Groomsmen portal)
- enhanced-user-profiles (User profiles)
- order-management-dashboard (Order processing)
Evaluate which apps are production-ready and consolidate overlapping functionality.

2.details:
Organize all applications into a professional monorepo structure with:
- Individual app folders
- Shared components and utilities
- Root-level package.json for workspace management
- Unified documentation
- Environment configuration templates

3.details:
Create Vercel deployment configurations:
- vercel.json for each application
- Custom subdomain mapping (admin.kctmenswear.com, wedding.kctmenswear.com, etc.)
- Environment variables configuration
- Build and deployment scripts
- Domain DNS configuration guide

4.details:
Push the organized ecosystem to the existing repository:
- Clean up workspace files
- Organize into proper folder structure
- Add comprehensive README files
- Include deployment documentation
- Set up proper .gitignore files

5.details:
Generate comprehensive documentation:
- Deployment guide for Vercel
- Environment setup instructions
- Custom domain configuration
- Application architecture overview
- Maintenance and update procedures
